channel.title: [508] better int system [508]
channel.description:
[size=36pt]NOTE: I DIDNT MAKE THIS IM JUST POSTING CAUSE I THINK ITS a NEATER INT SYSTEM[/size]
go to your itemdef.java and add these 2 methods
[CODE] public void newItem(String name, int dropModel, int maleModel, int maleArms, int femaleModel) { aRSString_362 = Class112.method1668(43, name);//Item Name anInt330 = dropModel;//inventory/drop model anInt390 = maleModel;//Male model id anInt347 = maleArms;//extra model anInt387 = femaleModel;//female? } public void zoom(int zoom, int rotation1, int rotation2, int offset1, int offset2) { anInt336 = zoom;//model zoom anInt389 = rotation1;//modelRotation1 anInt395 = rotation2;// model rotation 2 anInt358 = offset1;// model offset 1 anInt391 = offset2;// model offset 2 } [/CODE]
now when u want to add a new item u just do this
[code] case 3101: class19.newItem("Dragon claws", 14998, 14997, -1, 14997); class19.zoom(738, 245, 80,-2,3); break;[/code]
and it saves u alot of space and looks better :):p
credits
Dragonking of r-s = 100%

item.title: [508] better int system [508]
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[size=36pt]NOTE:
I DIDNT MAKE THIS IM JUST POSTING CAUSE I THINK ITS a NEATER INT SYSTEM[/size]

go to your itemdef.java and add these 2 methods

    public void newItem(String name, int dropModel, int maleModel, int maleArms, int femaleModel)
    {
    aRSString_362 = Class112.method1668(43, name);//Item Name
    anInt330 = dropModel;//inventory/drop model
    anInt390 = maleModel;//Male model id
    anInt347 = maleArms;//extra model
    anInt387 = femaleModel;//female?
    }
    public void zoom(int zoom, int rotation1, int rotation2, int offset1, int offset2)
    {
    anInt336 = zoom;//model zoom
    anInt389 = rotation1;//modelRotation1
    anInt395 = rotation2;// model rotation 2
    anInt358 = offset1;// model offset 1
    anInt391 = offset2;// model offset 2
    }

now when u want to add a new item u just do this

case 3101: class19.newItem("Dragon claws", 14998, 14997, -1, 14997); class19.zoom(738, 245, 80,-2,3); break;

and it saves u alot of space and looks better :)

credits

Dragonking of r-s = 100%
